class HibernateGormStaticApi

find

@Deprecated
D find(java.lang.String query, java.util.Map args, java.lang.Integer max)
Finds a single result for the given query and arguments and a maximum results to return value
deprecated:
Use Book.find('..', [foo:'bar], [max:10]) instead
Parameters:
query - The query
args - The arguments
max - The maximum to return
Returns:
A single result or null

@Deprecated
D find(java.lang.String query, java.util.Map args, java.lang.Integer max, java.lang.Integer offset)
Finds a single result for the given query and arguments and a maximum results to return value
deprecated:
Use Book.find('..', [foo:'bar], [max:10, offset:5]) instead
Parameters:
query - The query
args - The arguments
max - The maximum to return
offset - The offset
Returns:
A single result or null

find

@Deprecated
D find(java.lang.String query, java.lang.Integer max, java.lang.Integer offset)
Finds a single result for the given query and a maximum results to return value
deprecated:
Use Book.find('..', [max:10, offset:5]) instead
Parameters:
query - The query
max - The maximum to return
offset - The offset to use
Returns:
A single result or null

findAll

@Deprecated
java.util.List findAll(java.lang.String query, java.util.Map args, java.lang.Integer max)
Finds a list of results for the given query and arguments and a maximum results to return value
deprecated:
Use findAll('..', [foo:'bar], [max:10]) instead
Parameters:
query - The query
args - The arguments
max - The maximum to return
Returns:
A list of results
